name: Repuzzled
description:
Repuzzled

Repuzzled - pixel puzzle game where you have to use your rewind power to complete levels. That is my very first game developed for Brackey's Jam 2020.2 with a theme "Rewind".

!Important!

If you want to try other levels but cannot go through the current one, then go back to main menu (press P), click "Play", press letter O on your keyboard five times and reenter to level selection.

Controls
  • Use WASD to move around.
  • Press R to start record/rewind
  • Hold Space to push boxes
  • Press H to restart level
  • Hold E to interact with buttons
  • Press P to return to main menu
Credits
  • Code, music and some arts by me
  • Modified tileset by scut
  • Rewind sound effect by kasa90
Updates
  • 7th August - Fixed some bugs. Added back to main menu button ingame.
  • 8th August - Fixed laser beam lighting issue. Added 7th level. Added animation to "finish gem"
